Description: Salt; sulfur; earths and stone; plastering materials, lime and cement

Subentries.Description: Granite, porphyry, basalt, sandstone and other monumental or building stone, whether or not roughly trimmed or merely cut, by sawing or otherwise, into blocks or slabs of a rectangular (including square) shape:
Merely cut, by sawing or otherwise, into blocks or slabs of a rectangular (including square) shape
Having a thickness of 7.5 cm or more
